GXSP8P
Sonic Adventure DX Directors Cut

No Music [CosmoCortney]
0409389C 00000000
04093988 00000000

Tunnel view effect [CosmoCortney]
040C5350 3E000000

SFX Echo [CosmoCortney]
04085868 BF800000

SFX speed [CosmoCortney]
04891F9C 3FX00000
X = 0 = Slowly
X = 8 = normal
X = F = Fast

Screen Ratio & Mirrored GFX [CosmoCortney]
040C5580 XXXXXXXX
for XXXXXXXX
3F800000 = 4/3
3FA20000 = 16/9
3FC60000 = 21/9
BF800000 = 4/3 mirrored
BFA20000 = 16/9 mirrored
BFC60000 = 21/9 mirrored

Cripple Characters [CosmoCortney]
04568824 40000000

Funny Graphics in stages [CosmoCortney]
040A7B58 Bf800000

messed up water surfaces [CosmoCortney]
28788600 00000800
040C5348 BF800000
E0000000 80008000
28788600 00000001
040C5348 30000000
E0000000 80008000
28788600 00000002
040C5348 3F800000
E0000000 80008000
28788600 00000004
040C5348 50000000
E0000000 80008000
28788600 00000008
040C5348 70000000
E0000000 80008000
28788600 00000020
040C5348 7FFFFFFF
E0000000 80008000
28788600 00000040
040C5348 80000000
E0000000 80008000
28788600 00000200
040C5348 90000000
E0000000 80008000
28788600 00000400
040C5348 A0000000
E0000000 80008000
dPAD down, dPAD up, dPAD left, dPAD right, R, L, B or X to mess up in different ways
Y = Normal

Size Modifiers

DPAD right = upside down
